name: Golden Egg Goose (Jam Prototype)
description:
This game is made for Yogscast Game Jam: Giving

The idea stems from the story of the goose that gives golden eggs, and from that story this is the game I have made in just two days.

The goal is to shoot the enemies (before they reach you) while keeping the goose unharmed.

Control: Just mouse. Click to shoot. Hover to the golden eggs the goose gives to collect them for money.

All SFX were made using bfxr

Enjoy :)
